channel.title: Project godz hell v5 source and client help

item.title: Project godz hell v5 source and client help
item.dc:creator: @abk14101 abk14101
item.description:
@abk14101 wrote:

i need help with project godz hell v5: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442490.msg3993297.html#msg3993297
1.items
I.So when i right click on items, i get these options
for eg… if i right click santa hat…
Santa Hat.
Santa Hat.
Santa Hat…
Santa Hat.
Santa Hat.
Wear Santa Hat.
Use Santa Hat
Drop Santa Hat
Examine Santa Hat
Cancel
Can someone please help
II. when ever i add new item it turns to “null” please help

2.colors: can some one tell me how to get the colors back please
I dont know how to put colors back in source or client, i will rep for any one that helps.
“quoted on the source it says fewer colors on client” how do i get these colors back… i will uses httml , xml , javascript , or @color@, just teach me how to put them back on client

3.grand exchange, i need npc code for the grand exchange worker
and for grand exchange i dont know which file this is being imported to…

[code]

public void GiveMoney(int ItemID, String Ownerr, int Amount)
{
Owner = Ownerr;

if(ItemID == Item1)
{
Spot1 = 995;

Item1 = 0;

please help…
